definitions.definition: A mythological creature with the front head and forelimbs of a horse and the rear of a fish .
A part of the brain located inside the temporal lobe , consisting mainly of grey matter . It is a component of the limbic system and plays a role in memory and emotion.

main_definition: ( mythology ) A mythological creature with the front head and forelimbs of a horse and the rear of a fish .
secondary_definitions: ( neuroanatomy , anatomy ) A part of the brain located inside the temporal lobe , consisting mainly of grey matter . It is a component of the limbic system and plays a role in memory and emotion.
